Window Mode:
Low is the Minimum Acceptable, but recommend High until further investigation.
The UI is softer on Low but not on High, so try to find the specific setting that is causing this
Texture Pool Size: Low is technically acceptable, but if you can go to High, do so. I noticed a softness to the UI (specifically the crosshairs) on any option below High, so to avoid that, since it is always up on the screen, I recommend High.

Texture Filtering Quality: Can spot differences between Low, Medium, High near start of Exultia. Cannot see Ultra and above improving things, but that might not mean much. This could use Anisotropic Filtering which is an upper limit, not a fixed use so those higher options might be useful in other locations.
